places.title: StudentenStadt - rotes Haus bistro
places.challenge: There is a bell, hanging somewhere in the Bistro. You need to find out what happens, if you ring it, but be careful! If you do it yourself, you have to deal with the consequences on your own...
options: you have to ex a beer
You have to buy everyone a shot
you have to buy everyone a beer
places.right_answer: You have to buy everyone a shot

places.title: Bierstube
places.challenge: Challenge any person in the bar to play table football with you. Can you win against them?

places.title: HANS IM GLÜCK
places.challenge: Hans is a very old, common German name. Can you name the most common German surname?

places.title: TU Film
places.challenge: Each Christmas, there is a tradition of showing a certain old movie three times here. Find out which movie it is!

places.title: Schelling-salon
places.challenge: Which known German historical figure was banned from visiting this establishment for not paying their bills?

places.title: StudentenStadt
places.challenge: If you stand at the main square, and look around, there are four buildings around you. Find out, what is each common title!
options: Eastern, western, northern and southern house
red house, blue house, orange house, HSH
places.right_answer: red house, blue house, orange house, HSH

places.title: StudiTUM
places.challenge: you may not necessarily be able to come in by yourself. Find out a way to do it!

places.title: Mensa Innenstadt
places.challenge: There is a nice cafe somewhere in here, with a kind of crazy title. Can you find it?

places.title: Georg-Kühne-Zeichensaal (5505.01.550)
places.challenge: Do you see those groups of people with drawings of mechanical parts? Go to them, and find out which subject they are trying to pass – the hardest and longest subject in the Machine Course. Careful! You need to write the full title, no typos allowed!

places.title: Physik Bibliothek
places.challenge: Well then, physics library, huh? Not many people know about it, since it’s so hidden! Congratulation for finding it! Now, find a physic student of your choice, that does not mind being bothered, and tell him to solve this simple physics exercise!

place.title: Mensa Garching
place.challenge: Well, nice for you, you found the new, shiny mensa. But did you know there is also a more obscure, old one, that all locals know? Find it! It’s not that far away!

place.title: TU Film
place.challenge: Each Christmas, there is a tradition of showing a certain old movie three times here. Find out which movie it is!

places.title: Pinakotheken Wiese
places.challenge: There are three different Pinakoheken. Find out, how they are all called and write it in
options: the first, second, and third one

places.title: Schloss Nymphenburg
places.challenge: Walk around the maginificent castle and it's surrounding. There are some beautiful, not often seen in a city animals around here. Can you find them and tell me what they are? Trust me, you will know once you see them!

places.title: Frauenkirche
places.challenge: Frauenkirche is what everyone calls this church. But suprisingly, that is not the official name. Can you find out, what is?

places.title: Englischer Garten
places.challenge: Many locals here, enjoying their time in the nature. Without using English (each one of you is only allowed to speak in your native language!) ask one of them, how old they are and let them write it in the app

places.title: BMW Museum
places.challenge: There are certain things that every local knows. Find one, and ask them to tell you what the abbreviation BMW stays for. Careful for typos!

places.title: Odeonsplatz
places.challenge: Stay here for a while, and appreciate this magnificent places with such a ich history. The Odeonsplatz takes its title from the Odeon building, which currently serves as the building of the Bavarian ministry of the Interior. But it’s original role was different. Can you find out, what was it?

places.title: Geschwister Scholl platz
places.challenge: A very sad, and important story, but an important one to know. Please, inform yourself about the siblings’ story, and to prove it, write in the title of the organization they belonged to.

places.title: Deutsches Museum
places.challenge: Not a very known fact, but this museum used to host pop and rock concerts. Can you say, which one of those famous bands performed here?
